Flub.Name: Scale
Flub.Description: The scale of shapes on the slope.

Flub.Name: Displacement
Flub.Description: The amount of displacement to perform on the slope shapes.

Flub.Name: Direction
Flub.Description: The direction of the slope gradient.

Flub.Name: Stratified
Flub.Description: When enabled, creates long, stratified protrusions on the slope.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.
